DocAttribute.Name: PlacesObject
DocAttribute.Documentation: The _IfcObjectPlacement_ shall be used to provide a placement and an object coordinate system for a single instance of _IfcProduct_. > <small> <font color="#FF0000">IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  New inverse attribute.</font> </small>

DocAttribute.Name: ReferencedByPlacements
DocAttribute.Documentation: Placements that are given relative to this placement of an object.
